name: potato latkes
author: mookman288
description: This recipe uses a food processor, but you can also perform the shredding and pulsing by hand.
recipe: Shred &$0 and &$1 in a food processor using the shredder attachment
Pulse &$0 and &$1 a few times in a food processor using the blade attachment
Squeeze excess water out of &$0 and &$1 mixture
Combine &$0, &$1, &$2, and &$3 and form latkes 1/2 inch thick
Flip latkes and continue frying uncovered for 5 minutes
